entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow level 2100 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
